TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CborWriter extends System.Object

summary.span: 简明二进制对象表示 (CBOR) 编码数据的编写器。

span.span: A writer for Concise Binary Object Representation (CBOR) encoded data.

MemberSignature.Value: public CborWriter (System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode conformanceMode = System.Formats.Cbor.CborConformanceMode.Strict, bool convertIndefiniteLengthEncodings = false, bool allowMultipleRootLevelValues = false);

param.name: conformanceMode
param.span: 枚举值之一，指定对已编码数据执行的一致性检查的相关指导。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the guidance on the conformance checks performed on the encoded data.

param.span: 默认为 一致性模式。

span.span: Defaults to conformance mode.

param.name: convertIndefiniteLengthEncodings
param.span: 如果为 ，则自动将不确定长度的编码转换为确定长度的等效编码，并允许在一致性模式下使用不允许使用的不确定长度的写入 API；否则为

span.span: to enable automatically converting indefinite-length encodings into definite-length equivalents and allow use of indefinite-length write APIs in conformance modes that otherwise do not permit it; otherwise,

param.name: allowMultipleRootLevelValues
param.span: 如果为 ，则允许编写器写入多个根级别值；否则为 。

span.span: to allow multiple root-level values to be written by the writer; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteStartArray(valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> definiteLength) cil managed
Public Sub WriteStartArray (definiteLength As Nullable(Of Integer))

summary.span: 写入确定或不确定长度的数组（主要类型 4）的开头。

span.span: Writes the start of a definite or indefinite-length array (major type 4).

param.name: definiteLength
param.span: 确定长度的数组的长度；或对于不确定长度的数组，则为 。

span.span: The length of the definite-length array, or for an indefinite-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在规范一致性模式下，除非启用标志，否则编写器将拒绝无限长度的写入 。In canonical conformance modes, the writer will reject indefinite-length writes unless the flag is enabled.

exception.span: 参数不得为负。

span.span: The parameter cannot be negative.

exception.span: 写入新值超过了父数据项的确定长度。

span.span: Writing a new value exceeds the definite length of the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 父数据项中不允许使用已编码值的主要类型。

span.span: The major type of the encoded value is not permitted in the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 在当前一致性模式下，写入的数据不被接受。

span.span: The written data is not accepted under the current conformance mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteStartIndefiniteLengthByteString() cil managed

summary.span: 写入不确定长度的字节字符串（主要类型 2）的开头。

span.span: Writes the start of an indefinite-length byte string (major type 2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 推送一个上下文，在此上下文中，可以写入同一主要类型的明确长度块区。Pushes a context where definite-length chunks of the same major type can be written. 在规范一致性模式下，除非启用标志，否则编写器将拒绝无限长度的写入 。In canonical conformance modes, the writer will reject indefinite-length writes unless the flag is enabled.

exception.span: 写入新值超过了父数据项的确定长度。

span.span: Writing a new value exceeds the definite length of the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 父数据项中不允许使用已编码值的主要类型。

span.span: The major type of the encoded value is not permitted in the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 在当前一致性模式下，写入的数据不被接受。

span.span: The written data is not accepted under the current conformance mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteStartIndefiniteLengthTextString() cil managed

summary.span: 写入不确定长度的 UTF-8 字符串（主要类型 3）的开头。

span.span: Writes the start of an indefinite-length UTF-8 string (major type 3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 推送一个上下文，在此上下文中，可以写入同一主要类型的明确长度块区。Pushes a context where definite-length chunks of the same major type can be written. 在规范一致性模式下，除非启用标志，否则编写器将拒绝无限长度的写入 。In canonical conformance modes, the writer will reject indefinite-length writes unless the flag is enabled.

exception.span: 写入新值超过了父数据项的确定长度。

span.span: Writing a new value exceeds the definite length of the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 父数据项中不允许使用已编码值的主要类型。

span.span: The major type of the encoded value is not permitted in the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 在当前一致性模式下，写入的数据不被接受。

span.span: The written data is not accepted under the current conformance mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteStartMap(valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> definiteLength) cil managed
Public Sub WriteStartMap (definiteLength As Nullable(Of Integer))

summary.span: 写入确定或不确定长度的地图（主要类型 5）的开头。

span.span: Writes the start of a definite or indefinite-length map (major type 5).

param.name: definiteLength
param.span: 确定长度的地图的长度；或对于不确定长度的地图，则为 。

span.span: The length of the definite-length map, or for an indefinite-length map.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在规范一致性模式下，除非启用标志，否则编写器将拒绝无限长度的写入 。In canonical conformance modes, the writer will reject indefinite-length writes unless the flag is enabled. 映射内容被编写为数组的已声明大小长度的两倍。Map contents are written as if arrays twice the length of the map's declared size. 例如， `1` 必须通过连续调用和来写入大小为 int、类型为 string 的键的大小的映射 。For instance, a map of size `1` containing a key of type int with a value of type string must be written by successive calls to and . 由调用方来跟踪下一个调用是键还是值。It is up to the caller to keep track of whether the next call is a key or a value. 从根本上讲，这是一项技术限制，这是因为 CBOR 允许任何类型的键，例如，地图可以包含映射自身的键。Fundamentally, this is a technical restriction stemming from the fact that CBOR allows keys of any type, for instance a map can contain keys that are maps themselves.

exception.span: 参数不得为负。

span.span: The parameter cannot be negative.

exception.span: 写入新值超过了父数据项的确定长度。

span.span: Writing a new value exceeds the definite length of the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 父数据项中不允许使用已编码值的主要类型。

span.span: The major type of the encoded value is not permitted in the parent data item.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 在当前一致性模式下，写入的数据不被接受。

span.span: The written data is not accepted under the current conformance mode.
